text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the Maryland Health Care Commission.
"Department" means the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
"Eligible employee" has the meaning stated in § 15-1201 of this title.

"Health savings account" means a health savings account as defined in the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement and Modernization Act of 2003, Title 12, § 1201(a) as codified at Part VII, subchapter B, chapter 1, § 223(d) of the Internal Revenue Code.
"Program" means the Small Employer Health Benefit Plan Premium Subsidy Program.
"Small employer" has the meaning stated in § 15-1201 of this title.
"Small employer health benefit plan" means a health benefit plan as defined in § 15-1201 of this title that may be sold to a small employer under Subtitle 12 of this title.
"Wellness benefit" has the meaning stated in § 15-1201 of this title.
